actionCalls.description: If the call to the Payment Sale API is successful, apply the payment to the invoice.
actionCalls.name: ApplyPaymentToInvoice
actionCalls.label: Apply Payment to Invoice

actionCalls.description: Call the Payment Sale API. Charge the amount on the invoice to the payment method.
actionCalls.name: ChargePaymentMethod
actionCalls.label: Charge Payment Method

actionCalls.description: Create the assets for the order products.
actionCalls.name: CreateAssetsFromOrder
actionCalls.label: Create Assets From Order

actionCalls.description: Create the billing schedule for the order products.
actionCalls.name: CreateBillingSchedulesfromOrderProducts
actionCalls.label: Create Billing Schedules from Order Products

actionCalls.description: Create the invoice for the billing schedules.
actionCalls.name: CreateInvoice
actionCalls.label: Create Invoice

actionCalls.description: Send the email containing the errors from the Create Asset Order events.
actionCalls.name: SendAssetOrderErrorEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Asset Creation Error Email

actionCalls.description: Send the email containing all the errors from the billing schedule events.
actionCalls.name: SendBillingScheduleErrorEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Billing Schedule Error Email

actionCalls.description: Send the email indicating that the transaction is complete.
actionCalls.name: SendCompletedEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Completed Email

actionCalls.description: Send the email containing the invoice error information.
actionCalls.name: SendInvoiceErrorEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Invoice Error Email

actionCalls.description: Send the email containing error information about the payment sale.
actionCalls.name: SendPaymentSaleErrorEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Payment Sale Error Email

assignments.description: Add the error message records to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectErrorMessage
assignments.label: Collect Error Messages

assignments.description: Add the error message records to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectErrorMessages
assignments.label: Collect Error Messages

assignments.description: Add the invoice error detail event records to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectInvoiceErrorDetailEvent
assignments.label: Collect Invoice Error Detail Event

assignments.description: Add the invoice header error records to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectInvoiceHeaderErrors
assignments.label: Collect Invoice Header Errors

assignments.description: Add the invoice processed detail events to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectInvoiceProcessedDetailEvents
assignments.label: Collect Invoice Processed Detail Events

assignments.description: Add the order product records to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectOrderProductIDs
assignments.label: Collect Order Product IDs

assignments.description: Add the order product records to the collection variable.
assignments.name: CollectOrderProducts
assignments.label: Collect Order Products

assignments.description: Sets the EmailErrorDetails variable which is used in the email template.
assignments.name: SetEmailErrorDetailsPaymentSale
assignments.label: Set Email Error Details

assignments.description: Add the order ID and the order number to the order product.
assignments.name: SetOrderIDOnOrderProduct
assignments.label: Set Order ID on Order Product

assignments.description: Required. Set the ID of the payment gateway provider to use for this transaction.
assignments.name: SetPaymentGatewayID
assignments.label: Set Payment Gateway ID

assignments.description: Create the body of the email to contain the error messages.
assignments.name: SetupEmailBodyAssetOrderError
assignments.label: Set Error Email Body

decisions.description: Determine whether an error occurred during the creation of the asset.
decisions.name: AssetCreationFailed
decisions.label: Asset Creation Failed?

decisions.description: Determine whether an error occurred during the creation of the assets.
decisions.name: AssetsHaveErrors
decisions.label: Assets Have Errors?

decisions.description: Determine whether an error occurred during the creation of the billing schedule.
decisions.name: BillingScheduleErrorCheck
decisions.label: Billing Schedule Has Error?

decisions.description: Determine whether an error occurred during the creation of the billing schedule.
decisions.name: BillingScheduleHasError
decisions.label: Has Error?

decisions.description: Determine whether an error occurred during the creation of the invoice.
decisions.name: InvoiceHasError
decisions.label: Invoice Has Error?

decisions.description: Determine whether an error occurred during the creation of the payment sale.
decisions.name: PaymentSaleErrorCheck
decisions.label: Has Error?

formulas.name: AssetOrderErrorEmailBody
formulas.expression: "A Salesforce Flow didn't complete, because it could not create the assets:"

formulas.name: AssetOrderErrorEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "A Salesforce Flow didn't complete: Assets could not be created"

formulas.description: Email body for billing schedule error case.
formulas.name: BillingScheduleErrorEmailBody
formulas.expression: "The following errors prevented Salesforce Billing from completing order " + {!orderOutput.OrderNumber}

formulas.description: Email subject for billing schedule error case.
formulas.name: BillingScheduleErrorEmailSubject

formulas.description: Email body for invoice error case.
formulas.name: InvoiceErrorEmailBody

formulas.description: Email subject for invoice error case.
formulas.name: InvoiceErrorEmailSubject

formulas.description: Email body for payment sale error case.
formulas.name: PaymentSaleErrorEmailBody
formulas.expression: "Salesforce Payment Sale for invoice " + {!IterateOverInvoices.Invoice.DocumentNumber} + " wasn’t completed"

formulas.description: Email subject for payment sale error case.
formulas.name: PaymentSaleErrorEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "Salesforce Payment Sale for Invoice " + {!IterateOverInvoices.Invoice.InvoiceNumber} + " wasn’t completed"

loops.description: Loop through the event detail records for the Billing Schedule Created Event. Check for errors and other messages.
loops.name: IterateOverBillingScheduleEvents
loops.label: Iterate Over Billing Schedule Events

loops.description: Loop through the event detail records for the Create Asset Order Event. Check for errors and other messages.
loops.name: IterateOverCreateAssetOrderDtlEvents
loops.label: Iterate Over Create Asset Order Detail Events

loops.description: Loop through the invoice error detail event records.
loops.name: IterateOverInvoiceErrorDetailEvents
loops.label: Iterate Over Invoice Error Detail Events

loops.description: Loop through the list of invoice errors and collect the error messages into a single variable.
loops.name: IterateOverInvoiceErrors
loops.label: Iterate Over Invoice Errors

loops.description: Loop through the list of invoices and create the payment sale records.
loops.name: IterateOverInvoices
loops.label: Iterate Over Invoices

loops.description: Loop through the order products and copy the order product ID to a new variable.
loops.name: IterateOverOrderProductsGetID
loops.label: Iterate Over Order Products

loops.description: Loop through the list of order products and add them to the order.
loops.name: Read_Each_Record
loops.label: Read Each Record

recordCreates.description: Create an application usage assignments record for this transaction.
recordCreates.name: CreateBuyNowAppTagForOrder
recordCreates.label: Create Buy Now App Tag For Order

recordCreates.description: Create the order record for this transaction.
recordCreates.name: CreateOrder
recordCreates.label: Create Order

recordCreates.description: Create the order product records. The order products are related to the order.
recordCreates.name: CreateOrderProducts
recordCreates.label: Create Order Products

recordLookups.description: Get the order ID and the order number from the order that was created.
recordLookups.name: GetOrderOutputFields
recordLookups.label: Get Order Output Fields

textTemplates.description: Email body for when Buy Now completes without error.
textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateCompleted
textTemplates.text:
Your order has been placed successfully.


Details:


Order Number: {!getB2Borders.OrderNumber}

Invoice Number: {!amountLoop.Invoice.DocumentNumber}

Your payment of ${!BalanceAmount} was successful.

textTemplates.description: Email body for when Buy Now has an error.
textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateError
textTemplates.text:
Hello, {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName},


{!EmailErrorBody}

{!EmailErrorDetails}


﻿Thank you,

Salesforce Process Automation


You’re registered as {!$User.Username} in {!$Organization.Name}. Questions? Need help? Contact Salesforce Customer Support. <https://help.salesforce.com/mysuccesshub?id=solutionFinder>

waits.name: Pause_for_Completing_Order_Process_Fully
waits.label: Pause for Completing Order Process Fully

waits.description: Billing schedule creation is asynchronous. Wait until the Flow receives the Billing Schedule Created event, which indicates that Salesforce finished processing the billing schedule request.
waits.name: WaitForBillingScheduleCreatedEvent
waits.label: Wait For Billing Schedule Created Event

waits.description: Asset creation is asynchronous. Wait until the Flow receives the Create Asset Order event, which is published when Salesforce finishes processing the request.
waits.name: WaitForCreateAssetOrderEvent
waits.label: Wait For Create Asset Order Event

waits.description: Invoice processing is asynchronous. Wait until the Flow receives the Invoice Processed event, which indicates that Salesforce finished processing the invoice creation request.
waits.name: WaitForInvoiceProcessedEvent
waits.label: Wait For Invoice Processed Event

waits.description: Creating the payment is an asynchronous process. Wait until the Flow receives the Payment Creation event, which indicates that Salesforce finished processing the payment request.
waits.name: WaitForPaymentCreationEvent
waits.label: Wait For Payment Creation Event
